DOC.brief_title: Migraine With Aura Inducing Characteristics Effects Cerebral Arteries Blood Flow Hypoxia
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate migraine aura symptom hypoxia . With magnetic resonance imaging investigator investigate change - regional cerebral blood flow ( rCBF ) - rest state functional connectivity - circumference middle cerebral artery ( MCA ) , internal carotic artery , superficial temporal artery , medial meningeal artery , external carotic artery - brain metabolism And compare change age match healthy control group .
